name: The Janice Mirikitani Family, Youth and Childcare Center (FYCC)
description: Licensed early education and childcare for children 18 months – 5 years Mon-Fri 8:30AM - 5:30PM. The Janice Mirikitani Family, Youth and Childcare Center (FYCC) serves children of very low-income households. FYCC provides a holistic set of resources for home, school and community in a safe, welcoming and culturally diverse environment.
